title: Welcome to My Blog
content:
Hello, World!

This is an example blog post generated using the automated Python script. The system supports full HTML content, making it easy to create rich, formatted posts.

Features

  • Automated content generation from JSON
  • Static site generation with Astro
  • Dynamic comments via Hono + D1
  • GitHub Actions for CI/CD
  • Classic, readable CSS styling

To create your own post, simply run:

python scripts/generate_post.py your-post.json

Then commit and push to deploy automatically!
excerpt: An introduction to this automated blogging platform
author: Blog Admin
